english.segment1: Im captured by the love and I have become Your own. Surrounded by my God Im rising above the shadows
english.segment2: You want me to know. Im not alone. You want me to come to Your throne. I know
english.segment3: Its in Your atmosphere. Your spirit is here. I cant explain this moment. In Your atmosphere
english.segment4: Your love becomes real. My heart begins to sink into Your hands
english.segment5: Youre raining over me flooding my soul with peace. In sin You show mercy my gracious King
english.segment6: Ill come and hear You say. Youre precious to me
